mapper.select: SELECT sd.id, sd.value, sd.label, sd.parent_id FROM pb_dict sd WHERE del_flag = 0 AND parent_id = #{parentId}
SELECT sd.id, sd.value, sd.label, sd.description, sd.parent_id FROM pb_dict sd WHERE sd.del_flag = 0 AND sd.type = #{type}
SELECT sd.id, sd.type, sd.description, sd.parent_id FROM pb_dict sd WHERE del_flag = 0 AND parent_id = 0

SELECT pd.id threeId,pd1.id twoId,pd2.id oneId, CONCAT_WS('/',pd2.label,pd1.label, pd.label) label FROM pb_dict pd LEFT JOIN pb_dict pd1 ON pd.parent_id = pd1.id LEFT JOIN pb_dict pd2 ON pd1.parent_id = pd2.id WHERE pd.id = #{id}
